meta.title: Schiphol Airport Transfer Amsterdam | Reliable AMS Transport
meta.description: Reliable taxi to AMS Schiphol from ‚Ç¨45. Fixed rates, flight tracking, no search fees. Book your Airport transfer now!

hero.title: Stress-free to the airport
hero.subtitle: from ‚Ç¨45 fixed rate
hero.description: No surprises, no search fees. Book your ride to Schiphol with guaranteed arrival time and fixed price.

features: Free cancellation up to 3 hours in advance

filosofie.title: Private transport with the attention of a personal chauffeur
filosofie.description: We believe every ride should be an experience ‚Äî discreet, comfortable and fully tailored to your needs. Always on time. Always well taken care of. Always exclusive.

usps.title: Discreet, professionally dressed chauffeurs
usps.description: Selected for etiquette, driving style and confidentiality. Your privacy always comes first.

usps.title: Luxury vehicles: Mercedes E, S & V-Class
usps.description: Representative cars with optimal legroom, quiet cabin and premium finish.

usps.title: Punctual and reliable, 24/7 available
usps.description: We plan ahead and monitor in real-time, so you arrive on time without worry.

usps.title: Personalized service on request
usps.description: From drinks and music to route preferences: every ride is fully tailored to your wishes.

services.description: From private airport transfer to executive service ‚Äî every detail is designed to make your journey smooth, comfortable and worry-free.

items.title: Departure Transfer
items.subtitle: Carefree departure from home
items.description: Your journey begins the moment we arrive at your door. No hassle with parking or traffic ‚Äî we take you directly to the right departure hall, well in time for check-in. Relaxed start, that's what it's all about.
highlights: Personal chauffeur at your home
Drop-off at your terminal entrance
Luggage assistance to check-in desk
Traffic monitoring for optimal arrival time

items.title: Arrival Service
items.subtitle: Welcome home
items.description: After hours of flying you want one thing: to go home. Our chauffeur waits in the arrival hall with a name board, helps with your luggage and takes you to your destination in complete comfort. No waiting, no stress.
highlights: Meet & greet with name board in arrival hall
Real-time flight tracking ‚Äî always on time
60 minutes free waiting time in case of delay
VIP treatment from the arrival hall

items.title: Executive Transfer
items.subtitle: For business travelers
items.description: Time is precious. Our executive service offers you a mobile office: spacious Mercedes S-Class, WiFi, privacy and a discreet chauffeur who knows the fastest routes. Work on the go or relax before your next meeting.
highlights: Mercedes S-Class, BMW 7-series or Tesla Model S
High-speed WiFi and charging points for all devices
Quiet cabin and privacy screen available
Direct invoicing to your company

items.title: First Class Experience
items.subtitle: The ultimate luxury
items.description: For those who expect the best. Our First Class service combines top-of-the-line vehicles with personal attention and discretion. From champagne on board to luggage concierge ‚Äî every detail is taken care of.
highlights: Mercedes S-Class Long, BMW 7-series or equivalent
Champagne, soft drinks and premium water on board
Professional luggage concierge
Personal chauffeur who knows your preferences

items.title: Group & Family Transfer
items.subtitle: Travel together in comfort
items.description: Traveling with the whole family or a group of colleagues? Our luxury Mercedes V-Class offers space for 7 people with full luggage capacity. Everyone travels in the same comfort, no one has to stay behind.
highlights: Mercedes V-Class with leather interior
Comfortable captain seats and air conditioning
Child seats and booster cushions on request
Ideal for families, friends or small teams

items.title: Chauffeur by the Hour
items.subtitle: Your personal chauffeur
items.description: Sometimes you want flexibility. Rent our chauffeur by the hour: for multiple stops, a day trip, or simply because you want the freedom to set your own pace. Your chauffeur remains available as long as you need them.
highlights: Minimum 3 hours, no maximum
Free route choice and intermediate stops
Waiting time without extra costs
Perfect for multi-city trips or complex routes

cta.title: Tailored to your journey
cta.description: Have specific wishes? From multi-city transfers to VIP treatment ‚Äî we create the perfect airport experience for you.

infoCards.title: All terminals
infoCards.description: Whether you're traveling from Departure Hall 1, 2, 3 or the private jet terminal ‚Äî our chauffeurs know every route.

infoCards.title: Flight tracking
infoCards.description: We monitor your flight in real-time. Delayed or landed early? We adjust automatically.

infoCards.title: Premium vehicles
infoCards.description: Mercedes S-Class, BMW 7-series and Tesla Model S. Luxury, comfort and style in every detail.

sectionHeader.title: Choose your comfort level
sectionHeader.description: Every vehicle in our fleet stands for quality, comfort and style. Make your choice based on the experience you're looking for.

classes.name: Business Class
classes.description: Perfect balance between elegance and functionality. Ideal for business meetings, airport transfers and daily rides where you expect comfort and reliability.

classes.name: VIP Class
classes.description: For those who expect the very best. More spacious, quieter and more refined. With extra attention to detail and personal service that makes the difference at important moments.

classes.name: Luxury Van
classes.description: Exclusive group transport without compromises. Perfect for family outings, business delegations or friends traveling together. Everyone enjoys the same comfort and attention.

disclaimer.label: Please note:
disclaimer.text: All vehicles are cleaned and checked before every ride. Your chauffeur will be ready at least 15 minutes before arrival.

trustSection.title: Punctuality guaranteed
trustSection.description: We're always on time for you

sectionHeader.title: Transparent Pricing
sectionHeader.description: Choose the package that fits your business. No hidden costs, always clear rates.

packages.name: Flex
packages.description: Perfect for occasional business transport without commitments.

packages.name: Business
packages.description: Ideal for companies with regular transport needs.

packages.name: Corporate
packages.description: Complete package for organizations with high transport needs.

disclaimer.title: All packages include:
disclaimer.text: VAT, fuel costs, toll costs and insurance. No hidden costs or unexpected surcharges.

contact.text: Questions about which package suits you? Call

sectionHeader.title: Premium Taxi
sectionHeader.description: Exclusive transport trusted by Amsterdam's elite.
